2099630.name: Planet Achelous
2099630.description:
Discover the mysterious alien planet where our main character, Ash has crash landed. Avoid the hazards and defeat the enemies lurking within the ancient ruins of this unknown planet.

Planet Achelous is a third-person adventure game set amidst the detailed and decaying unknown world. Defend against unforeseen threats and solve the mysteries of this unwelcoming place inhabited by strange plants and dangerous creatures.

Who are the developers?
Just me! This is a passion project; I've had great fun working full time on PLANET ACHELOUS for the last year.

Can I help?
Yes, please! As I mentioned, I am developing this game by myself. I need the feedback of the community to help me find bugs and balance gameplay. If you have any suggestions or find a bug that isn't in the list of known-bugs, please drop by the forums and let me know.
